ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed
1 ¼ cups water, at room temperature

gear.name: Stand mixer or hands for kneading

cookingTips: Use fresh compressed yeast if available for superior flavor; store-bought active dry yeast works but differs slightly
Knead dough for 10-15 minutes until smooth, elastic, and slightly tacky—properly developed dough develops gluten for chewy crust
Allow dough to rise slowly at cool room temperature (68-70°F) for 2-3 hours or overnight in refrigerator for better flavor development
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the value of slow fermentation and cold proofing for authentic pizza flavor. Guide on dough hydration and gluten development for proper texture.
